net.jhoogland.jautomata

Class EditableAutomaton<L,K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jhoogland.jautomata.AbstractAutomaton<L,K>
      • net.jhoogland.jautomata.ExplicitAutomaton<L,K>
        • net.jhoogland.jautomata.HashAutomaton<L,K>
          • net.jhoogland.jautomata.EditableAutomaton<L,K>
  • Type Parameters:
    L - label type
    K - weight type (Boolean for regular automata and Double for weighted automata)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Automaton<L,K>, ReverselyAccessibleAutomaton<L,K>

    public class EditableAutomaton<L,K>
extends HashAutomaton<L,K>
    An automaton type that can be edited using the addState and addTransition methods. addState returns the state Id for the added state, which can be passed to the addTransition to specify the previous and next state of the transition.
    Author:
    Jasper Hoogland
